outputs.output_descr: 1. Institutional Capacity Building of DTCE.  2. Capacity building of all the stakeholders and partners to ensure successful implementation and sustainability of DTCE. 3. Effective Community participation in local governacne. 4.Promotion and assistance to voluntary associations of local nazims and councilors at district, tehsil, and union levels. (These are four outputs of the project that have been combined into one)

project_descr: Support to Devolution Trust for Community Empowerment
project_title: Support to Devolution Trust for Community Empowerment
